website_summaries.verdict: We recommend this sturdy cotton-based suit to novice beekeepers who don't want or need professional-level gear for a smaller operation.
pros: Material is very breathable, with good ventilation for hot weather
Detachable fencing veil provides wide field of vision
cons: Bees can sting through the fabric and at seams

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Killing wasps in my back yard just got a lot easier! I bought a medium-I'm 5'2" 158lbs
customer_reviews.author: Laura T

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but doesn't last, or protect against stings.
customer_reviews.text: After a month and a half the right rubber strap that goes under your feet to keep the pants from hiding up is worn and stretched out to be useless. I had worn the suit maybe 3 times. Because of this the sit doesn't fit snugly aginst my shoes anymore and I was stung on my ankle. I have also revived two bee stings through the suit and a white undershirt. I am sure bees have probably tried to sting me more than that but I am surprised that any stings can get through the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Best beekeeping suit I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'2" 195 lbs so decided to order the XX Large suit to allow for my normal clothing underneath and am glad I did. The fit of the suit overall wasAZAA so good it seemed like I had received a suit personally tailored for me. The cloth is dense and provided excellent protection against wasp & bee stings. For the quality of this suit and the price charged I am extremely pleased. These suits are the best on the market I feel based on suits I have used prior to this from other manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Bro Rat

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, great customer service, good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm new at beekeeping and this suit helped me feel safe while moving my first hives. I did get stung a couple of times through the fabric (on my biceps, just above where the gloves end - I'll wrap tape around there next time) but it protected me from potentially thousands of stings. The suit is easy to put on and comfortable. It has convenient pockets, clips and stirrup straps to keep the legs from riding up out of your boots or shoes. The gloves that came with it are also really good gloves and adding in the brush and hive tool were a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: discoverfire

customer_reviews.title: I used this suit one time and the zipper broke ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this suit one time and the zipper broke that holds on the veil. The zipper is made of plastic, not very strong considering the intended use. I bought the suit over 30 days ago, it is too late to get a refund or a replacement. I am now stuck with a $85 item that needs a $50 repair. I took it to a tailor to see if they could replace the zippers that attach the veil, they told me it would be $50 and I would need to go buy a solid zipper as well! Buyer beware: this suit has very cheap zippers!
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Mill Creek

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This suit is ok if you dont plan on using it much.. the "veil" wont stay expanded, it just rests against your face/forheaf.. (stings in the face). Not very good material for suit.. bees can sting strait through it if it touches your skin directly... sounds like an easy problem to fix with some under layers... however I live in florida and it it way too hot to do that. Buy this suit if you dont plan on doing removals or cutouts... buy a better suit.
customer_reviews.author: justin ashton

customer_reviews.title: I really like this suit
customer_reviews.text: I really like this suit. I feel completely safe in it. I feel like the canvas type material is thick enough. I feel like the veil/hat is very safe feeling, yet provides me with enough peripheral vision, and the netting is not too dark to see through properly...even with sunglasses. I am a 5'10" female weighing roughly 190 and the xl size swallows me. I don't really mind because it doesn't impede my work, and my husband can use it too if needed (he is 6'1" and 250lbs). I would totally recommend this, and would totally buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny265

customer_reviews.title: Good suit
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9” and 220 lbs (losing the weight slowly but surely) and the XL fit me just fine with room to spare. For the price, it is a great value. It’s very comfortable and does well keeping you cooler than most other suits. It has great protection from bees and I used it to get close to a hive with no injuries. You will need a set of gloves and good shoes to make this suit complete. I used those yellow kitchen gloves and regular tennis shoes and that seemed fine enough for what I was doing. You may want to get more professional equipment, though.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: It's not sting proof, buy larger and wear thick clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was allergic to bees and had a big bee nest near my sidewalk. It is not sting proof. The cloth is thin and lite. It does seal you up so bees can't get in. Buy a very large size and wear thick clothing under it to protect you. I wore a brimmed hat to keep the face screen away from my face and neck. It worked well for me. I will keep it around for next time.
customer_reviews.author: PaulyPrint

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'-10" and the large fits great! My wife is 5'-7" and looks pretty hot in her Medium bee suit!. Super well made with sturdy, overlapping zippers. We really like these. There is a hook sewn inside one pocket... not sure what that's for yet. I totally feel like I got my moneys worth. Not a complaint at all, but a suggestion... If it had knee pads built in that would be better cuz it seems like I'm always kneeling down to work on or inspect something and it hurts. My white knees are all brown now.
customer_reviews.author: Parallel

customer_reviews.title: I loved the quality of the suit
customer_reviews.text: I loved the quality of the suit. My only recommendation is for customers to have the ability to shorten the torso length. I am five feet, but fairly curvy, so I sewed a piece of fabric and a rope to allow the torso area to scrunch causing it to shorten. I had ordered the medium due to the measurements provided. My boots had taken cared of the trouser length, so that did not need any adjustments. My measurements: Height: 5'0 Bust and cup: 32 DD (dkny and wacoal brands) pants: size 2 or 4 depending on style (banana republic and Ann Taylor brand).
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! It is not only comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It is not only comfortable, but practical. The seams, stitching, zippers, and material are all high quality. It has great elastic at the ankles and wrists that seal up nice. The veil is easy to see through, its breathable, but if you get too warm its nice that you can just flip it back like a hood. I am 5'11" (ish) and fairly slim with long arms. Usually I have trouble with sleeve length on my clothes, but I got this in a large and it fits great, with room inside through out even if you're a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works great
customer_reviews.text: just got the suit and it looks great. I am 5' 10" and ordered a XL thinking it would shrink. The zipper closure is the same as other beek suits, a little cumbersome but more secure. Although white is traditional, I got the sand color just for fun. Will update this review after use and wash. UPDATE: spent several hours harvesting honey this weekend in 90 degree heat. The suit is reasonably comfortable and cool in the heat, but most importantly, no stings! Very happy with the suit.
customer_reviews.author: LvMiBez

customer_reviews.title: These shrink! Bought two sizes larger and will not fit after washing!
customer_reviews.text: Was fantastic when I first got it! I wear size XL, bought the 3XL. Plenty of room and easy to install. Figured quick on and off would be easy with the large suit. The seller stated via email that it needed to be washed before it was used so we removed the veil, washed it in cold water and line dried it. Well now it is plenty wide but the length is too short from my crotch to my solders to be able to wear the suit. My wife is much smaller and she can wear it now! Great design and features but unfortunately they are apparently not made from preshrunk cotton material and shrink ridiculously, two sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Ktazz

customer_reviews.title: Great protection!
customer_reviews.text: Great suit! After getting stung multiple times with my first beehive with only a veil and gloves - I was going to give up the bees until I got this suit. Now I confidently go into the hive and feel very safe. It was also a good deal too. I checked with Bee product catalogs and they have been at least $10 more and some don't come with a veil attached. I am a petite woman and the XS is just perfect. A lot of other companies don't even offer XS.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit - Wear Thick Under Layer
customer_reviews.text: This product worked perfectly. Had a very hard to find yellow jacket nest in saw grass. During the nest location process, I had at least 500 yellow jackets on me. Not one sting. This suit is worth every penny. Wear a thick under layer and the wasps / yellow jackets will never sting you.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Howell

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off, complete protection, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The best bee suit ever. Eady to get on and off, comfortable, the size is s little odd as the legs are so long, but it really protects me and makes me a lot calmer around my bees. The perfect (and pink!) suit.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth E Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Actually a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium and I am 5'9ss 129bs with a lanky build. Fairly long bodied but the crotch doesn't seem to be too much of an issue. I feel like its loose enough to give me air flow. I know a lot of people said it runs small but I think a medium sounds about right for me in USA measurements these days. I use to just wear a long sleeve shirt with gloves and a hat/veil but we have two aggressive hives now so I wanted the extra security. Face stings not cool. Disclosure: I haven't actually taken it into the field yet but it seems super promising.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Fast Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice beekeeping suit. I got an XS for my nephew as a birthday gift because he always wants to help me with my bees. The mesh head cover is really nice. The quality of the canvas for the rest of the suit is much better than mine. I am going to order one for me. My nephew loved the camo coloring. If you are looking for a quality bee suit - don't look any further than a Natural Apiary suit!
customer_reviews.author: Geoff T

customer_reviews.title: Suit is a great value and will be buying another in my size soon.
customer_reviews.text: This suit was a great value. I've worn it a couple of times now to do a few bee rescues. I am new to beekeeping and needed a suit. I bought a suit larger than I needed so that my boyfriend (6'4" & 200 lbs) could wear it it too. I will be buying one in my own size soon. Buying it larger than I needed also was less expensive at the time so it was a good deal. The suit is well made and I feel super safe in it which I think is important when you are new to bees.
customer_reviews.author: ParkSDTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks cute!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bee suit. I am 5'2 and ~105 lbs and a size small was a bit short in the torso for me (bending over=wedgie). Other than that though it is a great suit. The cuffs are tight so friends don't get in to sting me. Also, the frame of the bonnet is nice and stiff so the mesh stays away from your head.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Smithson

customer_reviews.title: Quality made, Apiary Beekeeping Suit
customer_reviews.text: Was a requested Christmas gift for our grown bee keeping kids. They love it. Its a quality heavy duty well made beekeeping suit. Should last a lifetime. Nice seller, fast shipping and well packed. Would highly recommend this seller and all of his products of which I'm bought quite a few items from. He doesn't sell anything that isn't a well made quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Dale A Terry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly and gave me the confidence to remove that basketball-sized bald-faced hornet's nest from my holly bush. Now I'm sort of wishing I could find another one to remove. Order larger than you normally would, as you should wear long pants and a heavy shirt under the coveralls.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: This one's a keeper
customer_reviews.text: I've tried out 2 other bee suits and I greatly appreciate this one! The fabric is on the thinner side which makes it more breathable, but still sting resistant! The elastics under the feet and for the thumb help me not worry about gettings bees in the suit. I ordered a size Large and am 5'11" 190lbs and this is roomy on me. Loving all the pockets for camera/phone/etc. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: No Stings!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this not only was it Pink, but great quality! The only reason 4 stars is the cuffs goodness it cuts off circulation! I need to have someone redo that cuffs at ankles and wrists too tight! Nothing can get through not even blood circulation lol...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Takeya

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know what to expect with this as I had no suit before, was just using white sweat suit with an insect head cover. Since I live in AZ I had to get something that I didn't get heat exhaustion with. Couldn't be happier with the product, it keeps the bees from stinging and is light weight enough that I am comfortable with plenty of room to move around in.
customer_reviews.author: Erin R.

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate for real bees.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty bee suit, but not for someone who is going to work real beehives - Flimsy material. Bees can sting thrust the suit. - Face mask screen developed 2 tiny holes after a year. Hard to visually detect as they were near the seam. Was stung in the Facebook multiple bees when the breaks were detected by the bees. - Zipper is plastic and doesn’t always seal. - foot straps broke on secons use. - the sizing a bit off. Medium was short in the legs- I’m only 5‘9 and the bottom stretched high on the angles/calf
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’1, 105 pounds with a 28” inseam and ordered the 2XS. It fits perfectly, not baggy but not too tight and when I crouch down it doesn’t ride up my butt lol. The only thing is the arms are a tad short if I wear a jacket under it but I also have gloves that go high up so that’s not a concern. Very high quality
customer_reviews.author: andrea humphries

customer_reviews.title: ... bought the x small suit and it is a perfect fit. It is very well made and feels ...
customer_reviews.text: I only 5 ft tall so I bought the x small suit and it is a perfect fit. It is very well made and feels substantial. I am new to beekeeping so I will continue this review as I use my suit but so far I am extremely happy I chose this product
customer_reviews.author: melanie r.

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are not correct
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be quality made BUT I haven't been able to use it due to size problems. I measured myself and added a little to make sure it fit and ordered a medium. Way way way too tight across my chest. Re-ordered an XL and I could fit 3 of me in it in the thighs alone. My bees are due to arrive in 5 days and I've spent the last 3 weeks trying to get the size that fit correctly. I have 2 suits in boxes to be returned, out $180 and will have to order yet another one. :~/ . I'll update this review if I ever get one that fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Harley 72 lady

customer_reviews.title: Beekeeper suit
customer_reviews.text: we are not bee keepers by no means. My son has to carry an epipen now for wasp stings. He have a cabin on the river and he likes to keep the grass and weeds cut down on the levee and he has been stung twice now. Had to rush him to the emergency room the second time he was stung. He was joking about getting a bee suit and I found this one. Love the fact that it's camouflage and not the bright white. He has yet to use it but will be soon!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Davis

customer_reviews.title: Veil ripped when washed
customer_reviews.text: Although I purchased in 2017, didn't wear but a handful of times only recently. I spilled sugar water all over myself so I washed the suit. Now the veil has 5 rips/holes in it. Also, the right ankle zipper doesn't stay closed and unzips. I would like to see if the veil mesh can be replaced easily.
customer_reviews.author: MearaMay

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible suite don’t buy it. There were bees were in my suit in no time. This suit is not thick at all either
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Noel Payne

customer_reviews.title: No Stings!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to move a beehive away from our pool. I didn't get stung! I like how the hood is connected to the suit. It all zips up nice and tight. I also taped all openings/zippers with duct tape, just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Meyer

customer_reviews.title: American made, American proud.
customer_reviews.text: The suit is as described and the continued communication tips the company has sent me have been very informative. I like the darker color, it doesn't show dirt and mud like the white suits. The Natural Apiary Company is very proud of their product and the suit is made in America. II have had two other suits and can never get the hood back on correctly after they are washed. I hope this suit is easier to keep clean and get the hood back on correctly. I believe I could contact the company and they would help me with this if it happened on this suit. I am overall very well pleased with the suit and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The large size fits about perfect. Although when I crouch down it does get ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6 foot, 195 lbs. The large size fits about perfect. Although when I crouch down it does get tight around the front of my neck. But, if I leave the zipper an inch or 2 from the top (still within the bail zipper) this problem is alleviated. Great product, definitely recommend. Especially after a recent hospital visit when the cheap hat/veil I used to use failed and filled with bees 😬
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good bee suit.
customer_reviews.text: This suit is a very good value. It's well made and not heavy. The material is a bit more thin than what you'd expect but it's durable. I used it when I was relocated a bee hive from under a house. This suit took a beating under there and yet not one bee was able to get into the suit nor deliver a sting through this suit. I thought, after I relocated the hive, that during inspection of the suit I'd find a tear, but not a one.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great for DIY homeowner projects
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was 100% reliable. I did not get stung once and I needed it to clear out my juniper bushes that housed approx 500 yellow jackets and wasps. I was point blank at their nest and could feel them thumping me they were being so aggressive but not one sting. I highly reccomend for use as protection in dangerous situations.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Morris

customer_reviews.title: This is a nicely functional keepers suit with quality construction throughout
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely functional keepers suit with quality construction throughout. The zippers are well fitted and heavy and the velcro tabs seal up the suit effectively in all the key places. The veil allows good peripheral vision to the sides and above. The sleeves and ankles are snug without being tight. The large sized fits me just right without a lot of excess fabric to float around in. This was a good choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: David A Boyle

customer_reviews.title: I found these suits unique looking as well as better fitting than any I had previously tried on
customer_reviews.text: I'm a newbie to beekeeping, but I have dug up every bit of information I can on the subject. I knew I wanted a full suit and not just a veil. Not being a fan of the classic white suits, I found these suits unique looking as well as better fitting than any I had previously tried on. I got to test it out at a beekeeping class and it worked beautifully. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: T. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Love my Beekeeping suit.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I'm 5'2" and ordered the large, (Yes, I'm short, and a little round.) so it's a little long in the legs, but I just bunch them up. It fits comfortably around my body, I can bend in it and not feel restricted. The material is pretty thick, so yes, it does get a bit hot to work in, but it's a very good, well made suit. THANK YOU NATURAL APIARY!
customer_reviews.author: A Ford

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: This suit is definitely lightweight so if you're looking for a light suit then this would be good. It is thin and the material of a light jacket-not sure if its worth $100. But the hood is airy and sits nicely on your head. The zipper works well and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: It allows bees to sting you like hell
customer_reviews.text: this is totally b******t. doesn't protect you at all from bee stings. wasted my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Pounchy

customer_reviews.title: Good Suit for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a great suit. Unfortunately, the zipper that attaches the veil was misaligned from the factory. If I am not careful, the teeth of the zipper separate because of this defect, which at one time left a 2" hole on my neck - NOT where I want a bee to get in! Since I was getting my bees the day the suit was delivered by Amazon, I could not exchange it. Still, this did not keep me from purchasing a second one to have handy if I have a visitor who wants to see the hive or need help moving something. For the money it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: justdeb1107

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome. I love the headpiece
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3" and weigh 135 pounds. I ordered a small and it fits well. I think I could have worn a medium too. This product is awesome. I love the headpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Great quality suit
customer_reviews.text: Great quality suit. It's my first one, and it's a huge improvement over just a hood combined with other jackets for protection. Being in Texas, the single-layer white cotton is great for working in the heat. Zippers are good-quality, and seals around the neck line, wrists, and ankles work well. The hood is comfortable and has good visibility. I find it best to wear a baseball cap underneath to keep the hood up and away from my face, but it works well with or without the hat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm a 2x by fit, ordered the 3x and it's fine.
customer_reviews.text: The suit is of a very good quality and well worth the money. I am 6'3", 260lbs. Usually a 2x for shirts. I ordered the 3x suit here and I'm glad I did. While it's somewhat baggy, the extra leg/crotch room was needed. I have a long torso and long arms, somewhat fit and not pudgy. Hope this helps someone. The 3x is fine for a 2x guy.
customer_reviews.author: BKE

customer_reviews.title: Pleased customer...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the suit, until the zipper broke. I tried three times to repair it. In frustration, I called Natural Apiary. They were amazing! They stood behind their product and in three days had a new suit in time to check my bees again. The product is good, the service was incredible! The new suit has much more room. And the zipper on the neck has been changed to two zippers. I think it will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Alan R. Olson

customer_reviews.title: The follow up service of the company has also been great, including tips on proper care of the suit
customer_reviews.text: My wife has 2 hives in our backyard but I have never wanted to spend the money for a beekeeping suit. When I helped her I took my chances in whatever I was wearing. When I saw this item I thought I would buy it because the price was right. I did not have high expectations as to the quality of the suit. I was quite surprised once I opened it at quality of the packaging and the weight of the suit. This is a high quality beekeeping suit and an outstanding value. The follow up service of the company has also been great, including tips on proper care of the suit. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great for mowing near a bee hive
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small neighborhood where all the houses are very close together. On May 31st a feral bee hive moved into my neighbors house. Instead of hiring a lawn care service to mow between our houses, I ordered this bee suit. It is perfect. Super heavy duty & very nice quality. It's much better than I expected. It's been 2 months since the bee's moved in. The suit works great. No bee attack yet. On the plus side, it's been fun watching the bee's every day outside my kitchen window. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone else so I can only tell that the beekeeping suit looks very well made. I will give more feedback once the person it was meant for actually uses it. I appreciate that the company's customer care manager reaches out through email and provides useful information on how to care for the suit. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Siana

customer_reviews.title: Great suit and Great Customer Service! Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.text: Customer Service has been amazing! The suit had absolutely nothing wrong with it but was just too big for me (5ft 5 140 lbs and I bought a large) They responded and assisted with getting a suit that better fits. I will definitely be shopping with Natural Apiary again. I love the pockets on these suits for keeping my tools close while working. Also like the straps on the hands and feet
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S.

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Stays fairly cool and comfortable. Good movement and flexibility. I hate wearing white suits and this suits me perfectly! I am 5'4" and 135 lbs, I got a small and and this suit is "almost" too small for me. But perfectly fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: julia stephens

customer_reviews.title: 💝💝💝 PRETTY IN PINK 💝💝💝
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new pink suit. I have other suits for everyday hard working days with my girls but the new pink suit is for special times!!! I bought it especially for my daughter and friends when the come to explore my bees and their hives. The fit is good and it is very protective for friends that may be a bit scared the first time around my bees. Thank you and I will be shopping with ya'll again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping, great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a very well-made product. It is well thought out with details like pockets and high-quality zippers. The hood is removable and could be worn by itself for those times you just don't want to fully suit up. I think the fabric is just about the perfect weight for hot or cooler days. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Optimistic about this suit
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the early stages of launching a beekeeping operation on my property, so I have no actual experience using one of these in the field. However, I do have experience wearing onesies and this one fits very well. I wear medium t-shirts usually but bought a large suit thinking a little extra room could only help keep bees at bay. I'm 6'1" 185 lbs and the large was the right choice. Fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ford

customer_reviews.title: Large means large
customer_reviews.text: Test drive this before you take it out to your apiary...the hood zipper is designed to detach your hood from the suit for cleaning...great for cleaning, not great if you are trying to get the hood closed before the bees get in. I'm 5'8 and 150...a medium would have been a better option. I think I'm going to have to add some elastic to the waist to keep it up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mozenko

customer_reviews.title: Mesh material on hood is a cheap plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for 6 months and there is already a tair in the hood! 5 bees got into the face of my jacket from the plastic mesh material ripping apart! Very poor quality mesh material. Also, Very difficult to see out of the vails hood as well. But the suit worked decent. Only got sting about 5 times through it... only
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Boyd

customer_reviews.title: thin fabric you get stung through it.
customer_reviews.text: This suit is too thin to be used for beekeeping, it perhaps is for fencing as the company mentions the veil is.
customer_reviews.author: bp

customer_reviews.title: Waiting on refund
customer_reviews.text: It was too big in the middle. But I returned it may 6th and still bo refund.
customer_reviews.author: sharon fluitt

customer_reviews.title: Using for fire department
customer_reviews.text: purchased 3 of these suits for our volunteer fire department. Suits are great. High quality cotton fabric. Zippers are plastic but not light weight. Velcro flaps are great for added protection around the neck. Size is accurate with extra room. We’re so pleased we’re going to another suit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good suit. Use their sizing! I'm 6'3" and 190# and ordered an xxl based on another review and it's huge! Should have ordered a bit smaller. I had a good hat / veil combo with long leather gloves paired with a long sleeve t shirt and jeans. I got hit through my shirt a couple times. Not sure if a stinger could penetrate the suit, probably not. It's cooler than the jeans but hotter than the T-shirt. I'll get a size large if I could do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Great suit...but hot
customer_reviews.text: I just started beekeeping and I've been afraid of getting stung but haven't yet with this suit! The only down side is it's HOT.... but i didn't want to spend 250-300 on a fully vented suit. But it's definitely something I'll be saving for. Ha in the meantime this suit it GREAT! Ok buying one for my husband now.
customer_reviews.author: B Wass

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fit as described, I used it in summer with jeans underneath, it was hot! I recommend wearing shorts under this thing. Get a set of gloves too, this does not include them. Overall, I like it and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Iniguez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend! It feels very durable
customer_reviews.text: Tried it once so far, had a number of bees around me trying to get to me. Not a single one got in. They were trying to protect their hive too. Definitely recommend! It feels very durable. The only thing that was a little close was that I have a long torso, so maybe Large was not big enough for me. But I can still fit in it comfortably (just barely).
customer_reviews.author: Shygar

customer_reviews.title: Great suit
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time beekeeper so I haven't gotten to use my suit quite yet, but I'm very happy with the quality. It's easy to put on and take off, the materials are quite robust, the zipper looks to be a good one as well. The sizing chart they have seems to be pretty accurate. I added a couple inches to my measurements as recommended by Natural Apiary and ended up with a medium instead of a small (would have been small had I not added to the measurement) and the medium suit I received fits very well and with enough room for movement.
customer_reviews.author: Linnaea

customer_reviews.title: good bee suit
customer_reviews.text: this is a good bee suit. I like the pockets and the way the hood zips on. the fabric is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent so far. I've used this a few times after I got tagged by one of my girls. Fits pretty well I'm 5'9" and 175 lbs and I have a large. Pockets are nice an big on the side of the hips for my brush and tools. Zippers and velcro flap on the veil make me much more comfortable working my hive. I had more then a few get in my veil and crawl on my face. Don't think that I'll need to worry about this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: K. DeLanty

customer_reviews.title: Bee suit sizing & good quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall good quality bee suit that seems to be well made. My only complaint is that the suit runs small. I am 6'4" @ 245lbs and after reading through other reviews decided to order size XXXL. Typically a XXL fits fine, but glad I took the advice of others & ordered one size larger. The XXXL fits fairly good without a lot of excess material, and what I expect from a normal XXL. I will have to give it a workout this spring when the bees need maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Ode2Othello

customer_reviews.title: Great value, well made, impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This suit is amazing and fantastic value. I really like the veil part because its taut and allows for great visibility. It's well made and quite heavy yet more breathable than I expected. The wrists and ankles are very secure and I really like how well secured the neck area is. My bee keeping partner is ordering one now too. The only personal negative is that it was made for someone taller than me (I'm 5'6") so the crotch hangs low making walking a little cumbersome so I may need to add a belt to hold it up a little
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not correct
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this suit in a size XXL. I normally wear an XL. The XXL was tight, so I ordered the same suit in an XXXL. The XXXL turned out to be tighter than the XXL? I was very disappointed in the sizing. I kept the XXL as I need to take down a wasp nest in my yard and did not have time to shop all over again. The suit seems to be made well ( material, zippers, etc.), I was just upset with the sizing, it is incorrect and cut very tight around the waist and thigh area. Amazon customer service was good with handling my return.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit, neck was tight tho, consider going up a size
customer_reviews.text: Fun color, nice cotton material, good veil. A very nice suit except the neck was a bit too tight for some reason--not an issue I've ever had before, so not sure why--but it wasn't comfortable. Everywhere else fit fine, but I need to be able to move and bend down easily. The company was terrific about responding and replacing it, so I'm going to try out a different size. Consider going up a size when you order.
customer_reviews.author: JennyB

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit - Great Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT suit. The posted measurements are very accurate. The ankles and cuffs are a little tight and I have very little wrists, but not a big deal - probably better that way for less bee entrance potential. I replaced a suit that had a box veil and hat with this and it makes a world of difference in comfort. I actually found this suit from Instagram accounts I follow and it was just by luck I found it on Amazon. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have used my suit once, and it met expectations. Comfortable protective and no stings! Love how protective the hood is around the neckline with zippers and velcro, so no sneaking in. I bought a larger as in order to wear over jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit but...
customer_reviews.text: Cute suit, but very hot. I’ve been stung through the suit on my arms and legs.
customer_reviews.author: MICKEY HOPKINS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was lightweight and comfortable. The stitching was good and does not appear that it would rip easily. I can see through the veil quite well but face is shielded well at the same time. Overall, l feel very protected and the design is stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Made to do the job!
customer_reviews.text: The service from this company has been great! They have gone above and beyond to make sure I am satisfied and that I understand how to care for it to get the best wear possible. It is well made and fits great. I bought a medium - I am 126 lbs and 5'6". Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: LizNewkirk

customer_reviews.title: Good suit for light duty work
customer_reviews.text: Good suit for light duty work. If you might wind up sweaty while wearing, I’d suggest a vented suit. If you do get sweaty, the material sticks to the skin, and stings will hit the wearer. Still a good quality suit, just need to be aware of that possibility.
customer_reviews.author: BigJim

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this suit, I was a bit skeptical about it's ability to block stings but it does a good job! It's lightweight and very well constructed. Really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit - Very High Quality
customer_reviews.text: The suite is perfect. I bought a Large and it fits very well. Well made and durable. Suit is exactly as it was described and the sizing guide helped to get the proper fit. Very happy with the product and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: LarsR

customer_reviews.title: No Stings, runs small
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6' tall and weigh approx.190lbs. Not that I normally buy bee suits, but my assumption for my size would have been L to XL. I ended up with the XXXL and it fits good. It's a little loose, but that adds to the ease of getting in and out of it and it's still a little tight getting the hood over my head, but not too bad. As far as how it works. I removed two hornet nests, one pretty large. They were angry and trying to sting me, but none succeeded. I wore a baseball cap to ensure the netting stayed off of my face while i was moving around and that worked well.
customer_reviews.author: P.Scully

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this suit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for me and a child size for my niece and nephews to share. I couldn't be happier with the fit and quality of construction with these suits. They are very comfortable and have an athletic fit. Not the big baggy fit of my friends suits. They are easy to put on. The built in veil is great and so are all the pockets. I also very much appreciated the tips that were emailed to me every few days. I highly recommend this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Semler

customer_reviews.title: Seems wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Received my suit on time and it's in perfect condition. I followed the measurements and ordered a size up a size others had suggested and it fit perfectly. I feel safe and protected, but we will see when the bees arrive! It has a lifetime warranty when registered, and came with excellent care instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: AAAA+++ seller!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I am usually a women’s medium and ordered an xs and it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Buck

customer_reviews.title: Quality suit quality company
customer_reviews.text: Best design I have seen ever I would give them 10 stars! Bought 4 different brands before and they are not as excellent as this product
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Nowoslawski

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise seems like a reasonable quality
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little big. I ordered a large based off sizing chart and need to return it for a Medium. Otherwise seems like a reasonable quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hack

customer_reviews.title: Thin and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a single sting or bee get in the suit, this one does a good job of zipping up tight, my advice would be to wear something to keep your ears down since the top of the veil is more form fitting than the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Xtion

customer_reviews.title: Pockets are easy access. The hood fits well with good visibility ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually used this with bees yet. I'm just starting out as a bee keeper. But the suit gives me a secure feeling. cuffs are snug and zippers and flaps seem to work well. Pockets are easy access. The hood fits well with good visibility and easily attaches to the suit providing complete coverage. I followed other reviews and ordered a larger size than normal. Glad I did. It wouldn't have fit otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: robert g. zoellmer

customer_reviews.title: 3 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received a lot of compliments on my pink suit! No stings so far and it isn’t too awfully hot in the Texas heat. Only problem I’ve faced is my torso is a little long for the suit and the clenched waistband hits at a weird spot on me. Updated review: I have been stung through the suit.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sikes

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I liked this suit so much, I am ordering one for my wife. Nuff said !
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Long

customer_reviews.title: Bees can get in the good if you are not careful
customer_reviews.text: Bees can get in the good if you are not careful. It is a bit thin and you may need to wear a coat under, which makes for hot honey collecting. But it's inexpensive, so one deals with the problems...
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: and it fits perfect! 135 lbs
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a pink person, but pink or camo were the options in my size. ;) I ordered a small, and it fits perfect! 135 lbs. 5'8" and there is plenty of stretch room and flexibility. Feels high quality and is very secure. No bees finding their way through this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: ... pf months now and have to say it is great! The material is quite thick and the zippers ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this suit for a couple pf months now and have to say it is great! The material is quite thick and the zippers are heavy duty. I added a pair of gloves to make this bee proof.
customer_reviews.author: T Greco

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made - a real bargain at this price! The material is soft and comfortable with a tightly woven but breathable fabric - very important here in the desert. The pockets are very convenient for carrying tools, camera, etc. XL size was a good fit - 5'10" 190 pounds. 1 extra inch of length in the arms would have been the only improvement I could imagine. This company stands behind their products - and is obviously very focused on customer service. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Livingstone

customer_reviews.title: I love this suit - it's really well made
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit - it's really well made. I will say that it gets unbearably hot in the summer, but that's what you get for wearing a full suit -- not the maker's fault at all. It's got so many pockets -- this was a suit that was definitely designed with a beekeeper in mind.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ziraphale

customer_reviews.title: great bee suit
customer_reviews.text: received this the other day no stings from head to toe wrists to shoulders I'm a big guy 5' 11" 285 lbs so i ordered a 3XL and fits perfect. only down side is it needs to come with gloves for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dell Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Wore only 5 times - broken leg zipper
customer_reviews.text: This is my first season with this suit. I am very disappointed that the leg zipper broke already. I like many features of this suit, but I am hesitant to order another, due to the zipper issue.
customer_reviews.author: Roda

customer_reviews.title: Happy with suit
customer_reviews.text: I really like the suit. I have ordered other suits from other companies. All size small suits drown me! I am 5'2" and 115 lb.... Although this one is big on me too, the tighter elastic waist band made it easier to fold up the waist so the crotch isn't hanging at my knees. I'll keep it. I like veils that have the built in hat... Wish your company made veils with built in hats instead of collapsible”
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves his new suit so far. He ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new suit so far. He has only used it once but it seems to fit just right per the fitting chart. We returned another brand that did not fit well to the chart sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Really cool looking and fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very well fitted and looks modern enough for me. I'm 6'1" 150lbs and the small fit was perfect for me the ankle straps are a nice touch for keeping the pants in place. Wrist is sealed nicely with elastic. When I do my aipry course I'll be able to see how it stands up against the bees.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

product_meta.title: Natural Apiary - Apiarist Beekeeping Suit - (All-in-One) - Fencing Veil - Total Protection for Professional and Beginner Beekeepers - Pink - Small
product_meta.description: Size:S| Color:Pinkenjoy your bees with total protection & great comfort! beekeepers suit - beautifully designed & safe protective clothing! What Natural Apiary your safety is priority. That's why we only use the best fabrics, protection: 65% cotton, 35% polyester, 220 Gsm Complete with an easy zip on zip off fencing style veil elasticized wrists & ankles reinforced extra thick collar offering extra protection for your neck comfort: extra strong YKK zips used throughout fully elasticized waist to accommodate a greater range of body sizes hive tool pockets are suitable for both right & left handed beekeepers machine washable versatility: large pockets car key/shed key fob size small: collar to ankle 63" (162cm) collar to crotch 36" (93cm) chest 32"- 48" (82-126Cm) waist 32"- 48" (82-126Cm) Leg 31" 80cm) arm 22" 56cm) shoulder/collar to ankle - to determine length of suit needed waist & chest diameter - to determine width of the suit needed - for best fit, so suit doesn't pull on your shoulders or crotch add 1" (2. 5cm) to your measurements, for a comfortable suit that will give you ample room to move full replacement . Natural Apiary stand behinds it products. If you're not completely satisfied for any reason, contact us to arrange a return for your money or replace the product!
feature_bullets: 🐝 stop bees having directed access to your skin with this strong & durable poly-cotton beekeeper suit/Jacket made with an optimal blend of 65% cotton & 35% Polyester, for strength and durability.

🔥 Protect Your Face from Stings and Flash Flames from your smoker with this Non-Flammable Veil Mesh - Severer injures can be caused if flash flame from a smoker or lighter catches a veils mesh, that’s why Natural Apiary insists on only using a Non-flammable mesh.

👓 SEE everything clearly with this clear visibility mesh - Great visibility is key to safety when inspecting your bee hives. This bee suits veil uses a patented mesh that has been designed to improve visual attention and prominence, make it easier for you to spot your Queen, eggs and mites.

💪 Feel Safe Knowing that your Suit will Protect you when you are working hard and when your bees are aggressive. This beekeeping suit uses genuine metal YKK Zips, that are 10 X stronger than plastic, 5 X stronger than brass. To ensure that this suit will never fail you.

👔 A comfortable fit that will give you room to move. Traditional bespoke suit tailoring by Devoted craftsmen creating the finest beekeeping suit design from London, UK. Using Secure stitching and combination of highly adhesive Velcro and industrial strength elastic. This unique beekeeper suit deign, provides unprecedented protection in the most vulnerable areas, making you feel safe when attending your BEES.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars642 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
